comments.name: Anna
comments.message: I love your show last summer in Stockholm! Best summer concert I've been to!

comments.name: Jason
comments.message: This is War is the best album I've ever bought, I can't get tired of listening to it all the time.

comments.name: Hansel
comments.message: When are you guys coming to Germany again?

comments.name: Ash
comments.message: My favorite song is Up in the Air. It always makes me happy and wanna dance!
